original_text: And the keeper of the prison awaking out of his sleep, and seeing the prison doors open, he drew out his sword, and would have killed himself, supposing that the prisoners had been fled.
korean_text: 간수가 자다가 깨어 옥문들이 열린 것을 보고 죄수들이 도망한 줄 생각하고 칼을 빼어 자결하려 하거늘

sentences.original_text: And keeper of the prison awaking out of his sleep
and seeing the prison doors open
supposing that the prisoners had been fled
